mapper.insert: insert into b_data_source( name, data_type, data_json, date_user, date_passwd, date_url, date_servers, date_topics, creater, create_time, state, iscancel, remark ) values ( #{name}, #{dataType}, #{dataJson}, #{dateUser}, #{datePasswd}, #{dateUrl}, #{dateServers}, #{dateTopics}, #{creater}, #{createTime}, #{state}, #{iscancel}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: update b_data_source set name = #{dataSource.name}, data_type = #{dataSource.dataType}, data_json = #{dataSource.dataJson}, date_user = #{dataSource.dateUser}, date_passwd = #{dataSource.datePasswd}, date_url = #{dataSource.dateUrl}, date_servers = #{dataSource.dateServers}, date_topics = #{dataSource.dateTopics}, creater = #{dataSource.creater}, create_time = #{dataSource.createTime}, state = #{dataSource.state}, iscancel = #{dataSource.iscancel}, remark = #{dataSource.remark} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, data_type AS dataType, data_json AS dataJson, date_user AS dateUser, date_passwd AS datePasswd, date_url AS dateUrl, date_servers AS dateServers, date_topics AS dateTopics, creater, create_time AS createTime, state, iscancel, remark from b_data_source where id = #{id}

select id, name, data_type AS dataType, data_json AS dataJson, date_user AS dateUser, date_passwd AS datePasswd, date_url AS dateUrl, date_servers AS dateServers, date_topics AS dateTopics, creater, create_time AS createTime, state, iscancel, remark from b_data_source where 1=1 limit #{page.offset},#{page.pageSize}
